product_name: Twin Six The Queen Of The Mountain Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Ride with a big grin when you wear the women's Twin Six The Queen of the Mountain Bike Jersey with its eye-catching white polka dots on black. The pockets in the back are bright red. Polyester fabric wicks away sweat and dries fast. Red accents inside neck and hem; rear 3-pocket panel is bright red with white polka dots. Full front zipper for venting and easy on/off. Twin Six The Queen of the Mountain Bike Jersey for women has a droptail back hem for full coverage.
short_description: Ride with a big grin when you wear the women's Twin Six The Queen of the Mountain Bike Jersey with its eye-catching white polka dots on black. The pockets in the back are bright red.
